website_summaries.verdict: Offering a nice light scent in a plant-based formula, this is a great option at a reasonable price.
pros: Parents love the light and relaxing lavender scent that it leaves on clothes
Made with a gentle formula, it is free of chlorine, phthalates, phosphates, synthetic fragrances, or dyes
No optical brighteners means it is gentle on fabric, so it is suitable for baby carriers and wraps as well
cons: While it does a great job of everyday stains, some users say it is not effective on tough stains

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Somehow this makes clothes softer than the non scented one although the lavender smell doesn't transfer onto the baby clothes. I was hoping washing my babies linen in lavender would help sleep but laundry comes out with no oders (good or bad). Since fragrants can irritate and annoy babies that's probably a good thing. I have been using babgabics since day one and my baby hasn't had nearly as many rashes or anything as only friends.
customer_reviews.author: A. SmilingTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Best for actually cleaning clothes! Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love this laundry wash for our daughter who is very allergic to every other sensitive skin detergent out there! We used Dreft for both boys but our little girl has extremely sensitive skin and this is the only detergent we found that actually cleans the clothes and smells good and she is not allergic to it. all natural ingredients, definitely recommend to everyone and the lavender one is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Simoneau

customer_reviews.title: The best detergent ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite detergent ever! The sent is not overwhelming like 99% of other detergents out there. My daughter has eczema and this is the only stuff that does not irritate her skin. We love it and I would highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mick F

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using babyganics baby laundry detergent for my daughter ever since she was born and I’ve stuck with it ever since. My daughter and I both have sensitive skin and never had any issues with it. I usually try to get the plain one that’s not really scented, but they ran out so I ended up ordering this one. The smell is not too strong and it’s smells lovely. The only downside was the packaging. The box came leaking a little so not only did I lose a bit of detergent, but it leaked a little on my other products that were packaged with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tisha

customer_reviews.title: Daughter's skin broke out
customer_reviews.text: My daughter doesn't really have sensitive skin, but she broke out to this detergent so I was only able to use a few capfuls.....
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: We use it for all our laundry
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. We use it for all our laundry not just for the baby. Our 5yo can be messy and any soon to be stains he has on his clothes, I just put a tiny bit directly on it and rub it in a little. Let it sit for a few minutes and throw it in the wash as usual. Comes out amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Wish it smelled better
customer_reviews.text: I prefer babyganics over other baby safe detergent but I do wish it had a stronger scent. If my daughter spills or throws up on her clothes, this doesn't get the smell out. Wish it smelled stronger so it can overpower the other smells.
customer_reviews.author: Salisagpb

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great detergent especially for babies with sensitive skin. It gets my babies cloth inserts super clean, yes the poopy ones too lol. To be honest one cup full does the job si anymore is just excessive use. I do wish for $20 we could 2 bottles of this same size. That much for one is just too much. Eith cloth diapers/inserts I wash more often
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Used this brand Over 6 months already. I have to say this is the best have used.just packaging sometime isn't good enough. Leaked before
customer_reviews.author: ming

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for many loads of baby laundry. So far it has cleaned many blow outs and spit-ups. The scent seems strong when putting it into the washer, but it is very subtle on the clothes, which I like. Some other detergents we have tried were real strong smelling on the clothes.
customer_reviews.author: rjamazon

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this consistently because I love it so much. Its natural and does not have lingering strong synthetic odors. My newborn is fresh and clean without chemicals
customer_reviews.author: Branchi

customer_reviews.title: I can’t smell the lavender, but it’s very gentle on a newborn’s skin.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the lavender scent, which I can’t reallu smell, so it’s more like unscented. But it’s been completely safe for my newborn baby’s skin. She hasn’t had any rashes or reactions to it. I’ll definitely be purchasing it again!
customer_reviews.author: AllyCat

customer_reviews.title: No smell?
customer_reviews.text: I like that you have to use a small amount to wash a large batch of clothes but the lavender one I bought really should be labeled "scentless".. it carries no smell. But the fact that it's plant based makes it a good fit for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Lilita

customer_reviews.title: Great Option for Baby Detergent
customer_reviews.text: This laundry detergent is our favorite for our baby girl. It has a much cleaner rating than other baby detergents on the market, and her clothes always come out feeling fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy Holland

customer_reviews.title: love this laundry soap for my princess clothes
customer_reviews.text: love this laundry soap for my princess clothes.. loved the softness and the lavanda smell is just a bit.. perfect!
customer_reviews.author: karen foronda

customer_reviews.title: Love the fact that this is Organic
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that this is Organic. I have this on an autoship to send to my soon-to-come first granddaughter. Soo excited. The autoship is so convenient too.
customer_reviews.author: Maryrose

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE everything about this. It gets stains out. I love the smell. The price is great. It last for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: SamPoindex

customer_reviews.title: great price for the amount of soap you receive
customer_reviews.text: great price for the amount of soap you receive. i would recommend the subscribe and save for even more discount
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best price and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, and so does my kiddo! Nothing bad to say, you'll agree when you see for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Fuller

customer_reviews.title: A+++
customer_reviews.text: I love the slight lavender scent. My favorite detergent for the baby. I know I am using a top quality product and it puts my mind at ease
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for infant & toddler
customer_reviews.text: This is a light scented efficient detergent we use for our infant and toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kukawski

customer_reviews.title: good brand
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product of this brand. I feel safe and clean.
customer_reviews.author: megan zhang

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My daughter has sensitive skin and this is the only detergent that never gives her a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Herbst

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I just love the Babyganic product line! I purchased this so I wasn't wasting my precious diaper soap on washing my baby's clothes. Smells amazing and does a fantastic job of cleaning my son's clothes. I think this one bottle will last a long time because my baby has so many clothes, that I'm not washing his laundry that often!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very easy to clean dirty clothes. fragrance free is better
customer_reviews.author: yhzjj

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting from a new company trying to make a splash in a huge pool.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Van Peenen

customer_reviews.title: We ONLY use babyganics detergent (original) and I ordered the ...
customer_reviews.text: We ONLY use babyganics detergent (original) and I ordered the lavender to change things up and our baby broke out in a rash from head to toe. She isn’t allergic because we use lavender baby wash in the bath. We will be sticking with the original from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki C.

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and great clean for my baby
customer_reviews.text: I got the unscented for my baby shower. I tried Nellies and that was crap... didn’t clean anything. So I still used the Babyganics with it in the end. This stuff isn’t fragrance but essential oils which I highly appreciate, as does my 6 month olds skin!! It cleans, though I will say I still have to hang the clothes with blowout stains on them out in the sun to bleach.
customer_reviews.author: ARH

customer_reviews.title: Good smell, not too strong
customer_reviews.text: Bought this accidentally and was going to return it because I hate the smell of lavender. However, we decided to give it a try and I’m glad we did. It doesn’t have a strong lavender smell at all, just enough of a smell to let you know it’s clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Portalatin

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies with sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Does things well enough. Smell isn't too strong but it is gentle, lavendery & pleasant. This is a great option for babies with sensitive skin & moms who really care about the ingredients in their cleaning products. A little bit goes a long way. The only thing I don't love is the handle of the detergent is only an indentation and not an actual handle. But since the bottle isn't too heavy, it hasn't been a problem yet. Just a slight design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I swear but this stuff! With 6 kids I've gone through my share of different laundry soap. This product works great! We have the monthly subscription through Amazon for additional savings! I almost also treat stains with it first and let it sit for a bit before washing with the needed amount. All of the spit up, food and other stains have come out great! Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: No smell but good for all skin types
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice in bottle but doesn’t leave any hint of smell on clothing when washed. Wish it did.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well
customer_reviews.text: Love the light lavender scent. I actually started to use this not only for my baby’s laundry, but for mine too.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: A must have for any household with small children. I use it all the time and it does a great job in removing stains. The fragrance is amazingly refreshing and pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette K.

customer_reviews.title: Love the subtle lavender scent that is just lovely to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the subtle lavender scent that is just lovely to smell while holding my baby. My baby has sensitive skin and this has not caused any skin rash so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sung

customer_reviews.title: Good detergent but no lavender smell
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is more natural than other baby detergents but it's supposed to have a lavender smell but the clothes come out smelling like nothing. I wanted a slight fragrance, not overpowering but it has nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Doting Mommie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it so light on the sent and smells great ... great for all including the earth
customer_reviews.author: C. Lea

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and never any residue. Holds consistent to quality of their other products. Very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it, but too much wasted cardboard on packaging wish there was less used
customer_reviews.author: Lisette Cozzolino

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get my baby items very clean, many items were left stained.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean Your Kids' Clothes
customer_reviews.text: When I put this into the washing machine with my kids' dirty clothes, a magical occurrence happens. In about an hour, the clothes are completely clean! Food, drinks, dirt, grime, drool, snot, vomit, pee, poop, this stuff cleans it all, no matter what my little guys throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: I Got Kids

product_meta.title: Babyganics 3X Baby Laundry Detergent, Lavender, 60oz, Packaging May Vary
product_meta.description: If you’ve been choosing between a detergent that’s made for babies or one that really cleans, we’re about to rock your world. Our super clean, super cleaning formula is totally win win. It’s formulated without sulfates but amazing plant and enzyme based cleaning power. If you’ve got a tiny baby but a big pile of dirty laundry, you just hit the laundry detergent jackpot.
feature_bullets: Formulated without: sulafates, 1,4 dioxane, optical brighteners, chlorine, phthalates, phosphates, synthetic fragrances or dyes
Non allergenic Dermatologist Tested Product not tested on animals

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
